name: hypergpu-distributed-training
description: Complete distributed federated learning system with blockchain integration

scripts.start: concurrently -n "backend,frontend,blockchain" -c "blue,green,yellow" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:blockchain"
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "backend,frontend,blockchain" -c "blue,green,yellow" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:blockchain"
scripts.start:all: concurrently -n "backend,frontend,blockchain" -c "blue,green,yellow" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:blockchain"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../smart-contracts && npm install
scripts.test:frontend: cd frontend && npm run lint && npm run type-check
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:contracts
scripts.build:all: npm run build:contracts && npm run build:frontend
scripts.clean: cd frontend && rm -rf .next node_modules && cd ../smart-contracts && rm -rf artifacts cache node_modules && cd ../python-ml-service && rm -rf __pycache__ .pytest_cache
